text: Pieter Johannes Elisabeth Kerkhoffs (26 March 1936 - 19 October 2021), known as Pierre Kerkhoffs, was a Dutch footballer. He played as a striker. Kerkhoffs played club football for SC Enschede and PSV. He later played in Switzerland for Lausanne Sport. From 1960 until 1965, he played for the Netherlands national football team. He was born in Geleen, Netherlands. Kerkhoffs died on 19 October 2021 at the age of 85.Foot: décès de Pierre Kerkhoffs, légendaire joueur du Lausanne-Sport ==Honours== PSV Eindhoven * Eredivisie: 1962–63 Individual * Eredivisie top scorer: 1962–63EredivisieStats.nl - topscorers ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch footballers
title: Pierre Kerkhoffs
